document.title: Diachroon seMantisch lexicon van de Nederlandse Taal - DiaMaNT
document.intro: Web interface to query the content of the lexicon The DiaMaNT (Diachroon seMantisch lexicon van de Nederlandse Taal) is a computational semantical lexicon that offers diachronical semantical information. It is built as a layer on top of GiGaNT, by adding semantic information. The lexicon links word forms to concepts and places these on... Lexicon content of the queried lemma
